p: Cells were grown to mid-log phase in PYE, LB, NB, and TSB media, respectively, harvested, and resuspended in 1Ã— PBS. The cells were then fixed primarily with 2.5% glutaraldehyde and postfixed in 1% OsO 4. Further, cells were prepared as previously described ( Morris, 1965). Cell imaging was performed using a Carl Zeiss EVO 40 scanning electron microscope.
